kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Select Frame
kw.doc: Sets frame identified by ``locator`` as the current frame.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Unselect Frame
kw.doc: Sets the main frame as the current frame.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

test.name: UI: Search function with Search Query

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.
kw.msg: Sending key(s) ('ปากกา', 'RETURN') to //input[@data-testid='txt-SearchBar'] element.
Pressing special key RETURN to element.

kw.arg: กรุณารอสักครู่

kw.name: Wait Until Element Contains
kw.arg: ค้นพบสินค้า
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` contains ``text``.

kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
